input.sentences: today we went to lunch for my birthday .
it was so much fun . i really enjoyed seeing my family .
my mom kept taking pictures of me . i think she 's proud that i can use chopsticks .
then we went outside and took more photos . the water was pretty neat .
here 's my bff taking a picture of the water . it was an awesome birthday .
output.sentences: We met for a birthday lunch.
The family had fun and enjoyed their meal.
Mom proudly takes pictures of her daughter.
The water looks pretty in these photos.
My Aunt loves taking pictures of the water.
